Paid Search Advertising

More calls • More Foot Traffic • More Web Visits

Use PPC advertising to amplify your marketing efforts and attract more customers.

I want more traffic

More signal and less noise

There is no better time to advertise than when someone already has determined they want your product or service and is actively looking to buy.

Businesses today need a strong search engine presence to be competitive, which means showing ads on Google Search results pages right when customers are looking to buy.

Fuel your website with high-quality traffic and watch your conversions explode. There are over 3 billion searches every day. These searches are full of people looking for answers and solutions to their problems. A percentage of these searches are problems that your business solves. Through the use of ppc management services, you can pull new customers to your business immediately.

Why Consider Search Advertising?

  • Be there when users are searching
  • Complements SEO efforts
  • Fast
  • Flexible
  • Targeted approach
  • increase your visibility on search engines
  • Get more traffic to your site
  • Measurable
  • Immediacy
  • Works for small or large budgets
  • Geo Targeting
  • Competition
  • RealEstate
  • High Intent
  • Responsive
  • Targeted
  • Profitable
  • Generate high-quality traffic and increase conversions:
  • Get Results Instantly
  • Efficiency

  • Create Intelligent Segmentations that will Help Drive Up Quality Scores and Conversions
  • Write Compelling Ad Text that Ensures that the Right Searchers are Clicking Your Clients’ Ads, then test it
  • Create Optimized Landing Pages
  • Conversion tracking and monitoring
  • Transparency
  • Result focused - getting clicks that convert
  • Cancel anytime with a 30-day electronic or written notice. Our services are backed with high integrity and want to earn your trust through providing great work.

  • All Assets are yours

  • Landing page optimization

Why would I Need Help With Local SEO?

  • You’re busy running your business.
  • You dont have time to setup advertising accounts
  • You want an adwords certified technician
  • You dont have time to manage and optimize your account on a weekly basis
  • You're not sure how to get started with PPC advertising
  • You need help determining a PPC strategy
  • You're not sure what kind of budget you need and how to best spend your marketing dollars to get the best return

How Much Does PPC Advertising Cost?

  • You only pay if your ad is clicked
  • We help optimize your campaign so it is only presented at the right times
  • We ensure your quality score is high which lowers your costs
  • We'll help determine how much you can pay per click

What's the Difference Between PPC and SEO?

  • Your in control vs google
  • Time to rank
  • Easily test and refine ads to get the highest converting
  • Better metrics
  • Highly targeted

Why Paid Search and Not Just Organic?

  • Paid and organic are very similar today
  • Most users dont pay attention to the difference
  • Speed
  • Ability to adjust in real time
  • Real estate
  • Competition

What Problems Will Search Advertising Help Solve?

  • Get On the First Page of Google. Fast
  • People Who Click on Paid Search Ads are Ready to Buy
  • Learn more about your customers
    • Where that person is located
    • How much time they spent on your site
    • What pages they visited on your site
    • What type of device they were using (mobile, tablet, laptop)
  • Quantifiable tracking and metrics of ad spend accurate ROI
  • Targeting and scheduling- no wasted spending
  • Testing abilities
  • Your in control as opposed to SEO

Won't Paid Search Make Me Look Bad?

  • Maintain Your Reputation
  • Relevant Trustworthy
  • Quality Score

Do I need to do paid search?

  • Missing out on revenue opportunities
  • Miss out on brand-building opportunities
  • Wasted potential
  • Wasted money, time, effort
  • Choosing not to compete on Google is essentially like choosing to hand your customers to your competitors.

Anatomy of a Great PPC Strategy?

  • Strategy
    • Keyword Research
    • Campaign Types
      • Call Only Campaigns
      • Remarketing Campaigns
  • Management
    • Organization
    • Ad creation
      • Engaging Ad Messaging
      • Better ad copy
      • Extensions
      • Geolocations
      • Day parting
      • Negative keywords
      • Device targeting
    • Proper match typing
    • Quality Site Experience
  • Optimization
    • Metrics and tracking
    • Optimize on a weekly basis
    • Testing and analyzing
    • Monitoring

Anatomy of a Great Paid Search Ad?

  • Focus on providing value and be relevant to the customer, how will your product or service benefit them?
  • encourage people to take action by using ugency or limited availability
  • Alleviate risks or fears
  • Ensure your pushing a next step (CTA)
